# Driatheli Group SRL - Infinitrade Romania

> Authorized distributor of industrial equipment in Romania since 2009.
> Pumps, valves, electric motors, heat exchangers, blowers.
> Brands: Grundfos, Wilo, Siemens, ABB, Alfa Laval, KSB, ARI Armaturen, Spirax Sarco.

## Company
- [About Us](https://infinitrade.ro/despre-noi)
- [Contact](https://infinitrade.ro/contact)
- [Team](https://infinitrade.ro/echipa)
- [Testimonials](https://infinitrade.ro/testimoniale)
- [Certifications](https://infinitrade.ro/certificari)
- [FAQ](https://infinitrade.ro/faq)

## Product Categories
- [Industrial Pumps](https://infinitrade.ro/pompe-industriale) - Grundfos, Wilo, KSB, Lowara, Ebara, Sulzer, Netzsch, Brinkmann, Becker, DAB
- [Industrial Valves](https://infinitrade.ro/robineti-industriali) - ARI Armaturen, Spirax Sarco, Ebro Armaturen, End Armaturen, Danfoss, Gestra Flowserve, Leser, Samson, Mankenberg
- [Electric Motors](https://infinitrade.ro/motoare-electrice) - Siemens, SEW Eurodrive, ABB, Bonfiglioli, Marelli, Brook Crompton, WEG, Nord, Leroy Somer
- [Heat Exchangers](https://infinitrade.ro/schimbatoare-caldura) - Alfa Laval, Kelvion, SWEP, Danfoss, Funke, Emmegi
- [Blowers & Fans](https://infinitrade.ro/suflante-ventilatoare) - Becker, FPZ, Ziehl Abegg, Gardner Denver, Elmo Rietschle, Elektror, Aerzen

## Industry Solutions
We serve 15+ industries including:
- [Petrochemicals & Refineries](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/petrochimie) - ATEX certified equipment
- [Energy & Utilities](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/energie) - Power plants and district heating
- [Food Industry](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/alimentar) - Stainless steel equipment, food-safe
- [Pharmaceutical](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/farmaceutic) - Clean room compatible
- [Water Treatment](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/tratare-apa) - Wastewater and drinking water solutions
- [Chemical Industry](https://infinitrade.ro/industrii/chimie) - Chemical-resistant materials

## Company Facts
- Founded: 2009 (17 years in business)
- Legal name: Driatheli Group SRL
- Tax ID (CUI): RO26209397
- Registration: J35/2901/2009
- Employees: 16
- Location: Ghiroda, Timiș, Romania
- Brands: 500+ international brands
- Clients: 800+ active industrial customers
- SEAP/SICAP: Registered supplier for public procurement
- Certifications: ISO 9001:2015, Authorized Distributors
- Delivery: 24-72h for stock items, throughout Romania

## Contact
- Address: Calea Lugojului, nr.47/B, Hala nr. 3, Ghiroda, Timiș 307200, Romania
- Phone: +40 371 232 404
- Email: secretariat@infinitrade-romania.ro
- Hours: Monday-Friday, 08:00-16:30
